name: AROUND THE BEND
description:
"Around The Bend" is a first-person horror game. You play as Rick who is living in the city prioritizing work above all. Rick is dealing with severe depression and anxiety which are worsened by the pressures of his working life. Rick has almost no relationships except for his sister.  A global catastrophical event leads to Rick finally going around the bend.

This is the first serious game i have ever made with unreal, its been quite the learning curve. Hope you like it! More will follow.

15 - 20 Minutes of gameplay.
